original_text: So I made an ark of acacia wood, and cut two tablets of stone like the first, and went up the mountain with the two tablets in my hand.
korean_text: 내가 조각목으로 궤를 만들고 처음 것과 같은 돌판 둘을 다듬어 손에 들고 산에 오르매

sentences.original_text: So I made an ark of acacia wood
and cut two tablets of stone like the first
sentences.korean_translation: 처음 것과 같은 돌판 두 개를 깎아서

sentences.original_text: and went up the mountain with the two tablets in my hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그 두 돌판을 손에 들고 산으로 올라갔습니다
